casebody.data:
State
v.
Avenger Ridgeway 375P09-6 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016

Mr. Avenger Ridgeway, Pro se.

Ms. Anne M. Middleton, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mr. Jon David, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of April 2016 by Defendant to Supplement Petition for Discretionary Review:

*36"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2016."
